abstract: Christina Romer, the president’s chief economics forecaster, said the economy would turn around in the fourth quarter, but that unemployment would keep rising for some time after that.
snippet: Christina Romer, the president’s chief economics forecaster, said the economy would turn around in the fourth quarter, but that unemployment would keep rising for some time after that.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s chief economics forecaster said on Sunday that the nation’s unemployment rate was likely to keep rising until 2010, even if the economy begins growing later this year.

headline.main: Obama Adviser Sees Unemployment Rising Until 2010
headline.print_headline: Obama Adviser Sees Unemployment Rising Until 2010
